title: Robust API for Compliance and Risk Integration
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want a comprehensive API that provides detailed audit logs and real-time access monitoring so that I can ensure compliance and maintain traceability while supporting seamless integration of third-party applications.

title: Audit Logs for Voice Interactions
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that all voice interactions are recorded in secure audit logs so that I can maintain traceability, monitor compliance, and uphold user privacy standards effectively.
